content.body: Excellent news: Bloomberg is happy to sponsor a couple hours of stenography at the upcoming TC39 meeting, if we can find a vendor in time, as a trial

content.body: mpcsh: Do you have any leads there?
content.formatted_body: mpcsh: Do you have any leads there?

mpcsh: Do you have any leads there?

content.body: belated regrets for missing again today
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: belated regrets for missing again today

content.body: had to drop, great to meet you Chris de Almeida
content.formatted_body: had to drop, great to meet you Chris de Almeida

org.matrix.msc1767.message.body: had to drop, great to meet you Chris de Almeida
had to drop, great to meet you Chris de Almeida

content.body:
> <@littledan:matrix.org> mpcsh: Do you have any leads there?

woohoo! not yet, but I can furnish some for you.

sorry all for missing the meeting — I've had a medical not-quite-crisis over the last few days and have been dealing with that. I'm getting our presentations on the agenda now (10min to the deadline! woof!) and I'll be on the ball next week.
